name: Bokujou Monogatari: Harvest Moon for Girl
overview: In Bokujou Monogatari Harvest Moon for Girls the player controls a young girl, that took a cruise aboard a luxury ship. However, her life was in peril when the ship crashed onto the coastline. Fortunately, a young boy saved her life. Now she want to find him and show him how much she cares. There are five boys in the town. It could be any one of them. She's welcome to stay in the town, under one condition: She has to make a name for herself by tending to the run-down farm in town and making it the best there is. Can you step up to the challenge? It'll all be worth it when you find the guy of your dreams... Harvest Moon for Girls is based on Harvest Moon: Back to Nature. It was released only in Japan.
